message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is fair for both of us.
Let's meet in the middle, 55% for me is the lowest I can go.
I'm feeling generous, Bob.  Take it before inflation eats away at your share even more.
Inflation is taking its toll, I need a bigger share to make up for it.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Inflation is hurting you more than me. Take the deal now before it's too late!
